Package source.camp

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
source.camp.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an enquiry for a camp. An enquiry is part of a camp (Composition).
Since:
2023-11-7

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private boolean
    active
    False denotes that this enquiry has been deleted.
    private Camp
    camp
    The camp this enquiry belongs to.
    private String
    content

    private boolean
    replied
    Whether this enquiry has been replied or not (true for replied already).
    private User
    repliedBy
    The user who replied this enquiry.
    private String
    replies
    The content of the replies.
    private Student
    student
    The student who made this enquiry.

      False denotes that this enquiry has been deleted.

      The camp this enquiry belongs to.

      The student who made this enquiry.

      The content of the enquiry.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Camp camp, Student student, String content)
      Creates a new enquiry from a student.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp this enquiry is regarding.
      student - The student who submitted this enquiry.
      content - The content of the enquiry.

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Camp camp, Student student, String content, boolean replied, User repliedBy, String replies)
      Creates a enquiry from the database with all the information provided. Active is default to true as deleted enquries should not be inside the database.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp this enquiry is regarding.
      student - The student who submitted this enquiry.
      content - The content of the enquiry.
      replied - Whether it has been replied or not.
      repliedBy - The user (staff/committee) who replied to this enquiry.
      replies - The content of the replies.

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Get active.
      Returns:
      Whether the camp is active (not deleted).

    • getCamp

      public Camp getCamp()
      Get camp.
      Returns:
      The camp object this enquiry belongs to.

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent()
      Get student.
      Returns:
      The student object who made this enquiry.

    • getContent

      public String getContent()
      Get content.
      Returns:
      The content of the enquiry.

    • isReplied

      public boolean isReplied()
      Get whether replied.
      Returns:
      Whether the enquiry has been replied or not (true for replied already).

    • getRepliedBy

      public User getRepliedBy()
      Get the user who replied.
      Returns:
      The user object who replied this enquiry.

    • getReplies

      public String getReplies()
      Get content of reply.
      Returns:
      The content of the replies.

    • isSubmittedBy

      public boolean isSubmittedBy(Student other)
      Check if the given student is the creator of this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      other - The student to check.
      Returns:
      True if student is creator, false otherwise.

    • viewEnquiry

      public void viewEnquiry()
      Print out the content of this enquiry.

    • editEnquiry

      public boolean editEnquiry(Student student, String newContent)
      Edit the content of the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      student - The student who attempts to edit this enquiry.
      newContent - The new content of enquiry.
      Returns:
      True if content is successfully updated, false if enquiry has already been deleted / answered.
      Throws:
      NoAccessException - If student is not the author of this enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(Student student)
      Delete this enquiry by marking active as false. Application class should use this attribute to know which enquiry should be deleted from the database.
      Parameters:
      student - The student who attempts to delete this enquiry.
      Returns:
      true if enquiry is successfully deleted, false if enquiry has already been deleted / answered.
      Throws:
      NoAccessException - if student is not the author of this enquiry.

    • replyEnquriy

      public boolean replyEnquriy(User user, String replies)
      Reply this enquiry by a camp committee or staff. The committee will receieve one point.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who attempts to answer this enquiry.
      replies - The replies to this enquiry.
      Returns:
      True if successfully replied, false if enquiry has already been deleted / answered.
